mapper.select: SELECT SEACH_SEQ, TYPE, AREAA, AREAB, AREAC, SILVERNAME, SERVICE, GRADE, LAUITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM SILVERSEARCH WHERE TYPE=#{type} ORDER BY GRADE
SELECT COUNT(SEACH_SEQ) FROM SILVERSEARCH WHERE TYPE=#{type}

SELECT A.SEACH_SEQ ,A.TYPE ,A.AREAA ,A.AREAB ,A.AREAC ,A.SILVERNAME ,A.SERVICE ,A.GRADE ,A.LAUITUDE ,A.LONGITUDE ,B.DETAIL_NUMBER ,B.ESTABLISHMENT ,B.APPROVAL ,B.ADDRESS ,B.HOUSE_NUMBER ,B.PARKINGLOT from SILVERSEARCH A ,DETAILS B where A.SEACH_SEQ = B.SEACH_SEQ ORDER BY GRADE
